#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides vboxguest #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin: export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
vboxfound=0 if dmidecode | grep -i VirtualBox ; then vboxfound=1 fi [ "$vboxfound" -lt 1 ] && exit 0
case $1 in start) printf "$bold===> Starting VirtualBox guest services$normal\n" /usr/local/VirtualBox-guest/additions/VBoxService --pidfile /var/run/VBoxService.pid ;; esac

#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides vboxguest #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin: export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
[ -f /var/run/VBoxService.pid ] || exit 0
case $1 in start) if [ -n "$usbip" ] ; then printf "$bold===> Starting VirtualBox guest services$normal\n" sudo /usr/local/VirtualBox-guest/additions/VBoxClient --clipboard sudo /usr/local/VirtualBox-guest/additions/VBoxClient --display sudo /usr/local/VirtualBox-guest/additions/VBoxClient --seamless sudo /usr/local/VirtualBox-guest/additions/VBoxClient --draganddrop fi ;; esac
